title: Brentwood Extra Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Silver, One Size (BTWTS446S)
features: Sleek and durable stainless steel body
Safely remove bread with Extra lift
Extra wide slots for thick artisan breads and more
description: Use the Brentwood Appliances extra wide slot 4-slice toaster to heat toast, bagels, waffles, pastries, and more. It features 3 convenient functions: reheat, defrost, and cancel. Enjoy your preferred level of toast using the 6 setting shade selector. Safely remove toast using the extra lift lever. Simply remove the crumb tray for quick and easy cleanup. Toast any variety of bagels or artisan breads thanks to the extra wide slots.

title: Stays Cold On The Sides! (REVIEW After Owning For 2.5 Years)
